itemOne.title: Create your profile
itemOne.heading: üëã To start, let's get to know each other
itemOne.description: You are just a few steps away from launching your first campaign!

itemTwo.title: Create your organization
itemTwo.heading: ‚ú® Welcome to Magma
itemTwo.description: Personalize the experience of your ambassadors and candidates by creating your own organisation..

itemFour.title: Choose your integrations
itemFour.heading: üéØ You want to reach your target audience
itemFour.description: Choose the channels you want to use to reach your target.

itemFive.title: Add your ambassadors
itemFive.heading: üí™ You're almost there
itemFive.description: Add your ambassadors now, and they'll be the first players in your campaign.

itemSix.title: Define your criteria
itemSix.heading: üéâ Last step before the welcome session
itemSix.description: Define the main criteria to be used for matching.

itemSeven.title: Plan your welcome session
itemSeven.heading: ‚úÖ Congratulations, your platform awaits you
itemSeven.description: All you have to do is choose a time slot for your welcome session on Magma..

convertProspects.description: Allow your candidates to meet with an ambassador during the hiring process to improve conversion.

reactivateProspects.description: Reactivate your cold prospects by offering them quality feedback thanks to your ambassadors.

targetAudience.label: Your target audience

advice.convert:
According to our data, 92% of our clients who have chosen Your prospects to convert, offer connection on these channels:
  • • Through your communications
advice.convertReactivate:
According to our data, 89% of our clients who have chosen Your prospects to reactivate and Your prospects to convert, offer connection on these channels:
  • • Through your communications
  • • Within your forms
advice.reactivate:

  • • Through your communications
  • • Within your forms
advice.target:
According to our data, 87% of our clients who have chosen Your target audience, offer connection on these channels:
  • • On your website
  • • Through your communications
advice.targetConvert:

  • • Through your communications
advice.targetConvertReactivate:

signupCriteriaView.advice: Choose the most important criteria for you here. You can always modify it or add secondary ones later.

image.description: Express your brand with a photo or illustration. Download our template with the design guidelines ->
image.tooltip: It is recommended to upload a cover image at 1200 x 545 pixels (the ideal aspect ratio is 2.20:1).

organizationDesign.editDescription: Does this campaign need a different logo, colors, or header? Enabling this option allows you to customize the organization design only for this campaign.

organizationProfile.editDescription: Does this campaign need a different organization name or a specific privacy policy? Enabling this option will customize the organization profile for only this campaign.

referralForm.description: Allow users to accompany someone they know directly on this campaign.
referralForm.label: Refer form feature

sharingPage.description: Allow users to share this campaign directly on their networks.
sharingPage.label: Sharing page feature

campaignCreationView.shortNameDescription: This name will appear as name sender for user notifications (Email and SMS).

campaignMomentsView.add: Add a new moment to the relation

deleteCampaignMomentModal.cancellable: This action is not cancellable. Are you sure you want to continue?

campaignMatchingView.createCta: Add a new criteria to create a better matches
campaignMatchingView.editDescription: The matching criteria are used to find the right helper for each helpee. They are automatically integrated into the matching algorithm. You can define up to 3 criteria and define their importance.
campaignMatchingView.setTouchpointsDescription: Touchpoints allow users to define which channels they want to exchange on. The algorithm will favor the helper with the most common touchpoints if two helpers are selected for a helpee.

matchingPanel.criteriaOptions: At least one criteria option is required
matchingPanel.duplicateOptions: This option already exists for this criteria
matchingPanel.duplicateWeight: Two criterias cannot have the same strength in the matching algorithm
matchingPanel.limitReached: Criteria cannot have more than 20 options; contact us or delete an option to add a new one.
matchingPanel.strengthLabel: Matching algorithm strength for this criteria

campaignIntegrationView.description: Find integrations to share your campaign to your future helpees.
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionBulk: Match helpees you already have their approval in bulk.
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionEmail: Share your campaign to your helpees via emails or in your email sequence.
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionEmbed: Integrate your campaign sign-up form directly on your website pages.
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionId: Use this ID to setup the widget or email auto-signup. Get help
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionLink: Share this links to make helpers and helpees sign-in to your campaign
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionQr: Insert a QR code link to all of your communication supports.
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionSignup: Propose a one click signup on this campaign to your helpees.
campaignIntegrationView.descriptionWidget: Add a widget button that open a modal with your campaign sign-up form.
campaignIntegrationView.shareDescription: Find all instructions to share your campaign and get helpees flowing in.

campaignLaunchView.activateCampaignDescription: Now that your helpers are selected, you can launch your campaign. Your helpers will be notified that the campaign is being launched.
